headline: Is Allstate (ALL) Pricing Reflect Recent Insurance Market Shifts Accurately
summary: If you are wondering whether Allstate's current share price still offers value, this article walks through what the numbers are saying about the stock today. Allstate recently closed at US$199.94, with returns of a 0.4% decline over 7 days, 5.8% decline over 30 days, 1.9% decline year to date and 9.3% over 1 year, alongside 57.1% over 3 years and 116.5% over 5 years. Recent news around Allstate has focused on how the insurer is positioning itself in the broader US insurance market, including...

headline: Auto Insurance Premiums Wont Stop Rising, Even for Careful Drivers
summary: Auto insurance premiums continue to climb across the United States, and even drivers with spotless records are feeling the pinch. While conventional wisdom suggests that careful driving should keep costs down, the reality is that insurers price policies based on factors far beyond individual driving history. The mechanics of insurance pricing reveal why premiums keep ... Auto Insurance Premiums Wont Stop Rising, Even for Careful Drivers

headline: Allstate Dividend Hike And Earnings Spark Fresh Focus On Shareholder Returns
summary: Allstate (NYSE:ALL) announced an increase in its quarterly dividend alongside its latest fourth quarter and full year earnings release. The company paired the dividend move with strong reported results, underscoring its focus on returning cash to shareholders. The update comes with Allstate’s share price at $199.94. For investors watching NYSE:ALL, the combination of a higher dividend and solid earnings puts fresh attention on a stock that has returned 9.3% over the past year, 57.1% over...
